duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee all operational aspects of the branch and assist customers with teller transactions and other banking functions.
Coach associates on performance, including sales conversations, operational items, and customer interactions.
Collaborate with internal partners, such as small business officers, mortgage officers, private wealth managers, and others.
Receive continued education and training to meet individual sales performance and operational goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration or comparable college and/or business experience (Master's preferred)
